Tech.name: The Sword And The Soul
Tech.Description: The Master Sensei has learned that the sword can bring moments of perfect harmony, just like art or meditation. When fi ghting with a sword, any time you reduce an opponent to Down, Out, or Dead, you regain 1 Void Point. This can temporarily increase your total Void Points above your Void Ring, although any such “extra” points disappear at the end of the current skirmish.

Tech.name: The Body Is Illusion
Tech.Description: The Master Sensei has studied meditation and enlightenment to such an extent that he can transcend the limitations of the flesh. You may take a Simple Action to spend a Void Point to ignore Wound Penalties (including Down, but not Out) for the remainder of this skirmish, or for ten minutes when outside of a skirmish.

Tech.name: Sword Of The Sensei
Tech.Description: The Master Sensei knows that a true teacher can share his greatest power with his students. Once per day, you may take a Simple Action to roll Awareness/Meditation at a TN of 25 plus 5 for each ally fi ghting alongside you. If you succeed, your allies gain the benefi ts of your Rank One technique for the remainder of this skirmish.

Requirements.Requirement: Be a member of Dragon clan
You must be chosen or taught by another Master Sensei and cannot be Brash or Proud.
